page.title: 14HART OF LISBURN
page.content:
Launch of the Book Hart Of Lisburn
The book was launched at Rathvarna Teachers Centre on Wednesday 16th October 1985 at 7.30 p.m. by the His Worship, the Mayor of Lisburn, Councillor Walter Lillburn.
The President of the Methodist Church, Rev. Skillen spoke about Sir Robert's Methodist connection and Councillor Savage, the Mayor of Craigavon also soke about Sir Robert's Portadown connection. Lady Hilda Etain Hagart-Alexander also spoke on behalf of her great grandfather Sir Robert Hart. Also present was the chairman of the Lisburn Historical Society and Lt. Colonel Alexander Brodie of Perth. Approximately 100 guests attended the reception with refreshments.
